body:
Cheney,

Have you seen [this example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=boris-p&fork=hydra&id=LadyBug_Combine_solarEnvelopes&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0)? Boris has also created this video. You can use sunpath to generate to sun-vectors for any desired time.



<iframe _origwidth="640" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="267" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hRtsxgJCVEw?wmode=opaque" width="475"></iframe>
